name: Leashed
description:
48h spelkollektivet april 2019 jam - theme : elasticity

What happen when a doggo to stop the walk ? He pull the leash !

Playing the hooman or the dog you have to happily kill the other by pulling the leash. the more you charge, the harder you pull ! Look out for the the spike, they hurt !

Key features :

- party games

- 2 players game

- fast paced

- 15 levels

- amazing graphics

- a dog


ONLY playable with controllers:

- left stick to move

- press A to jump

- RB to charge, release to pull

Credits:

Sound: Cajsa Larsson  ( @_hstrd on Twitter )

Art: Rikard Carlsson

Level Design: Gabriel Hector

Code: Pierrick Pamart
